## What are the original data sources (including web links or other pointers to the original material)
Cities population source 1: https://github.com/plotly/datasets/blob/master/us-cities-top-1k.csv 
UFO sightings source 2: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/utkarshx27/ufo-sights-2016-us-and-canada/
State population source 3: https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial/2020/data/apportionment/apportionment-2020-table02.xlsx

## Explanation of all variables you include here.
City: City of sighting
State: State of sighting
Latitude: Latitude of sighting
Longitude: Longitude of sighting
Sightings: Total summarized sightings per each state
IsCoastal: Whether the state is coastal or not

## Basic summary statistics: number of rows, column, and number of missing/otherwise invalid values by each column
50 Rows
3 Columns
No missing or invalid variables
